name: Inqwise Shortcode
author: Basil Goldman / Inqwise

sections.description:
Allows the use of a special short code [inqwise] for embedding Inqwise online surveys and forms.

Example:
[inqwise guid=”036b6bbd-949e-4669-b880-26fac57963fd”]
sections.installation: For old school manual installation people: Unzip “inqwise-shortcode.zip” file and copy the folder “inqwise-shortcode” into the /wp-content/plugins/ folder. Then go to the Plugins area of the Admin and activate. Otherwise, search for “Inqwise Shortcode” from the admin area of your WordPress site in Plugins > Add New.
sections.faq:
What is Inqwise?

Inqwise is an online survey software and questionnaire tool that help you create online surveys and forms.

What can I build with this?

Basically, the possibilities are endless. Here’s a short list of examples to give you an idea of Inqwise’s versatility:

  • Customer Survey
  • Customer Satisfaction Survey
  • Market Research Survey
  • Business Survey
  • Consumer Survey
  • Meeting and Event Planning Survey
  • Job Satisfaction Survey
  • Employee Survey
  • Product Feedback Survey
  • HR Survey & Training Survey
  • Non-Profit Surveys
  • Feedback Form
  • Contact Form
  • Mailing List
  • Job Application
  • Bug Tracker
  • Invitations / RSVP

short_description: This plugin allows you to easily embed Online surveys and forms built with Inqwise's online survey software into your sidebar, pages, and posts.
description:
Allows the use of a special short code [inqwise] for embedding Inqwise online surveys and forms.

Example:
[inqwise guid=”036b6bbd-949e-4669-b880-26fac57963fd”]
